name: Sabo's Pit
description:
The world is once again threatened by the ancient horror named Sabo. Traverse a dungeon teeming with terrible creatures, and sever the evil being's tie to this reality.

Gain EXP and level up to gain perks. Master the combat system to face off against Sabo itself on Floor 25.

---

music from The End is Nigh
